display_long_description:
You wake up in a cold sweat... What was that noise from the closet? I don't remember this tunnel being here...

**MONSTERS IN MY CLOSET** is a spooky, nostalgic Virtual Reality experience full of scares, monsters, and an unreliable rechargeable flashlight! Can you make it all the way to the 100th floor?

[media]

# AN ENDLESS NIGHT
Summon your bravery to descend to the 100th Floor. Only then will the nightmare end!



# THE PATH
Tackle a complex, randomized system of scares thoughtfully scattered throughout a seemingly endless path.

[media]

# THE MONSTERS
Different monsters with unique behaviors...

- The Creeper: All he wants is love!
- The Wanderer: Stay out of his way!
- The Chaser: Hope you can run fast enough!
- The Jumper: Don't freak out!
- The Watcher: Keep your distance!

[media]

# THE TOOLS
- An unreliable shake-to-charge flashlight.
- A pair of legs ready to sprint. But don't run out of breath!
- A wit to know when to run and when to hide...

[media]

# COMFORT AND GAMEPLAY
- Roomscale or Seated experience
- Simple stealth mechanics
- Intuitive, addictive gameplay
- A perfect run with no mistakes could take 20-30 minutes (extremely unlikely)
[media]
